document.title: NOAA PMEL Live Access Server (LAS) command injection

notes.text: All information products included in [https://github.com/cisagov/CSAF/tree/develop/csaf_files/IT/white](https://github.com/cisagov/CSAF/tree/develop/csaf_files/IT/white) are provided \"as is\" for informational purposes only. notes.title: Legal Notice

notes.text: Sites running NOAA PMEL Live Access Server (LAS) are vulnerable to remote code execution via specially crafted requests that include PyFerret expressions. By leveraging a SPAWN command, a remote, unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary OS commands.
notes.title: Risk Evaluation

notes.text: Fixed in a version of 'gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.las.filter.RequestInputFilter.java' from 2025-09-24. See updated LAS guidance here: https://github.com/NOAA-PMEL/LAS/blob/main/README.md
notes.title: Recommended Practices

product.name: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Live Access Server (LAS) 8

cwe.name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')

notes.text: Sites running NOAA PMEL Live Access Server (LAS) are vulnerable to remote code execution via specially crafted requests that include PyFerret expressions. By leveraging a SPAWN command, a remote, unauthenticated attacker can execute arbitrary OS commands. Fixed in a version of 'gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.las.filter.RequestInputFilter.java'  from 2025-09-24.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: NOAA PMEL Live Access Server (LAS) PyFerret command injection

remediations.details: Users running LAS 8 should apply the fix as described at https://github.com/NOAA-PMEL/LAS/blob/main/README.md, which involves a version of 'gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.las.filter.RequestInputFilter.java' from 2025-09-24.

Users running LAS 8 should apply the fix as described at https://github.com/NOAA-PMEL/LAS/blob/main/README.md, which involves a version of 'gov.noaa.pmel.tmap.las.filter.RequestInputFilter.java' from 2025-09-24.
